TopicTitle: Did I land on Mt. Satan?

Articles.Content: I do not have pictures but believe me, I was landing and I see I am heading for these pitch black mountains, normal right? Well it was mid-day, but that's not the creepy part, I landed perfectly but when I got out for a surface sample my screen went black, sorta, the altitude messed up and sprang to 666 km and the timer went to 00:00:00 and my nav ball faced straight down.... any explantation? I had also lost my world, it won't lord, kind of, it shows the quit button and bottom bar fine, but it's just pure black for everything else..... how creepy right
That is a long-time bug called the Hell Kraken.
